snippet.title: Potion Quest game trailer
snippet.description:
Potion Quest is my new game!

It's a puzzle game where the player must complete recipes by knocking potions into the recipe area as they drop from above.

You have limited time so must act fast and get the recipes completed!

It's available to play, for free, on https://Vex667.itch.io/potion-quest

#game #freegames #freegame #itchio #graphicreality #godotengine
